text:
Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel follows Danvers, an Air Force officer, as she becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes after earth gets involved in a galactic war between alien. The movie is set to release on March 8, 2019.
Captain Marvel stars Brie Larson as Carol Danvers/Captain Marvel, Jude Law as Walter Lawson/Mar-Vell, Gemma Chan as Minn-Erva, Lee Pace as Ronan the Accuser, and Samuel L. Jackson as Nick Fury.
The first trailer for Captain Marvel was released back in September and it showed Danvers' origin story, her powers, and her adventures in space. The second trailer dropped last month, giving us more insight into the plot and showcasing some epic action sequences.
What do you think about this new poster? Are you excited to see Captain Marvel on the big screen? Let us know in the comments!assistant

Here's a rewritten version with some minor adjustments:

Marvel Studios has just unveiled a brand-new poster for the highly anticipated film, Captain Marvel!

Featuring Brie Larson as the titular hero, the poster showcases Captain Marvel in all her glory, sporting her iconic suit and hairstyle. With her fists clenched and a fierce determination in her eyes, it's clear that she's ready to take on whatever challenges come her way.

Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel tells the story of Carol Danvers, an Air Force officer who becomes one of the most powerful heroes in the galaxy after Earth gets caught up in an intergalactic conflict.
